attributes.action: to intervene to help  savers recoup their money frozen in  accounts at Kaupthing Singer & Friedlander (IOM) Ltd.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Kaupthing Singer & Friedlander operated under an asset guarantee by its parent UK mainland bank Kaupthing. The failure of KSF (IOM) is therefore not  only a matter for the Isle of Man government but also for Westminster.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
